Package models.color

Class ColorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.color.ColorFactory
  • public class ColorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    ColorFactory class. Generates a new color based on the last color in the list. The new color is generated by adding a fixed step to the last color. The new color is then checked for contrast, grayness and brightness. If the new color does not pass the checks, a new color is generated by adding the fixed step to the new color. This process is repeated until a valid color is found or the maximum number of iterations is reached.
